content:
The Russian anti-aircraft missile complex was destroyed using an FPV aroma.

Appropriate videoPosted on March 12Land troops of the Armed Forces.

The enemy Buk ZRK was discovered and destroyed by Roman Great OMB soldiers.

Buk belongs to the family of self-propelled anti-aircraft missile complexes, designed to combat shunting aerodynamic goals at small and medium heights, in conditions of intensive radioprotidia.

Earlier, the Armyinform reported that the SCO fighters were destroyed by the BUK.
title: Defense forces destroyed the next "beech"
description: The corresponding video was posted on March 12 by the Armed Forces. Enemy BUK "BUK" ...
author: Army Inform
